Pre-Game Insights: The Detroit Tigers are 72-71 this year and they have lost three of their last five games. Detroit lost game one of this series, but they won game two by a score of 2-1 on Saturday.
The Oakland Athletics are 62-81 this season and they have lost three of their last four games. Oakland won game one in extra innings by a score of 7-6, but they lost on Saturday.
Others: The projected starting pitcher for Detroit is Ty Madden, who is 0-0 with a 3.00 ERA and a 1.22 WHIP over 9.0 innings pitched this season. Madden has allowed three earned runs and eight hits in two outings this year. The projected starting pitcher for Oakland is JT Ginn, who is 0-0 with a 4.30 ERA and a 1.02 WHIP over 14.2 innings pitched this year. Ginn has allowed six earned runs in his last two starts (11.0 IP).
